name: closeracks
desc: close all racks and monitor state

name: openracks
desc: open all racks and monitor state

name: r0open
note0: get rtos:hold:0:gpio_do_read gets the state of rack 0 relays
note1: setmb  sbmu:hold:538 0  tries to close rack 0
note2: setmb  sbmu:hold:539 0  tries to open rack 0 gets already open
note3: set rtos:hold:0:101 45 does create an event
note4: set rtos:hold:0:99 4 does create an event
note5: setmb sbmu:hold:539 0 sends open rack to sbmu modbus no events detected

name: r0close
note0: get rtos:hold:0:gpio_do_read gets the state of rack 0 relays
note1: setmb  sbmu:hold:538 0  tries to close rack 0
note2: setmb  sbmu:hold:539 0  tries to open rack 0 gets already open
note3: set rtos:hold:0:101 45 does create an event
note4: set rtos:hold:0:99 4 does create an event
note5: setmb sbmu:hold:539 0 sends open rack to sbmu modbus no events detected
